'''Daipai''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Monoceros Caeli Chapter]], Act I: [[Mighty Cyclops' Adventure!]]

During the first part, [[Across the Sea]], he was sent to patrol the area around [[Minlin]] while the Millelith investigate an active unattended [[Ruin Guard]].

===Appearance===
Daipai is a man with fair skin, brown eyes, and black hair. He wears the standard Milelith uniform, and like other Millelith members, he is seen with a polearm.
